Examples of course material

Lecture slides and IPython demos

  • Truncation and Taylor series: Pre-lecture, Post-lecture, IPython Notebook

  • Monte Carlo methods: Pre-lecture, Post-lecture, IPython Notebook

  • Axial deformation: Pre-lecture, Post-lecture

IPython demos in PrairieLearn

  • Public Numerical Methods demos

Collaborative learning activities

  • Programming-based activities: game of craps and random walk, image texture and spot the difference, Markov chains, Find Waldo

  • Hand-written activities: design of tailgate cables, bike spindle, guitar neck.

  • Numerical methods examples

  • Solid Mechanics examples

Homework and quiz questions for frequent assessments (PrairieLearn)

  • Non-coding questions

  • Short-coding questions

  • Long-coding (Machine Problems) questions

  • Drawing questions
